00037 #include "AVI_avi.h"

00045 /* avi_set_compress_options gets its own file... now don't WE feel important? */
00046 
00047 AviError AVI_set_compress_option (AviMovie *movie, int option_type, int stream, AviOption option, void *opt_data)
00048 {
00049     int i;
00050     int useconds;
00051 
00052     (void)stream; /* unused */
00053     
00054     if (movie->header->TotalFrames != 0)  /* Can't change params after we have already started writing frames */
00055         return AVI_ERROR_OPTION;
00056 
00057     switch (option_type) {
00058     case AVI_OPTION_TYPE_MAIN:
00059         switch (option) {
00060         case AVI_OPTION_WIDTH:
00061             movie->header->Width = *((int *) opt_data);
00062             movie->header->SuggestedBufferSize = movie->header->Width*movie->header->Height*3;
00063 
00064             for (i=0; i < movie->header->Streams; i++) {
00065                 if (avi_get_format_type(movie->streams[i].format) == FCC("vids")) {
00066                     ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->Width = *((int *) opt_data);
00067                     movie->streams[i].sh.SuggestedBufferSize = movie->header->SuggestedBufferSize;
00068                     movie->streams[i].sh.right = *((int *) opt_data);
00069                     ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->SizeImage = movie->header->SuggestedBufferSize;
00070                     fseek (movie->fp, movie->offset_table[1+i*2+1], SEEK_SET);
00071                     awrite (movie, movie->streams[i].sf, 1, movie->streams[i].sf_size, movie->fp, AVI_BITMAPH);
00072                 }
00073             }
00074 
00075             break;
00076 
00077         case AVI_OPTION_HEIGHT:
00078             movie->header->Height = *((int *) opt_data);
00079             movie->header->SuggestedBufferSize = movie->header->Width*movie->header->Height*3;
00080 
00081             for (i=0; i < movie->header->Streams; i++) {
00082                 if (avi_get_format_type(movie->streams[i].format) == FCC("vids")) {
00083                     ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->Height = *((int *) opt_data);
00084                     movie->streams[i].sh.SuggestedBufferSize = movie->header->SuggestedBufferSize;
00085                     movie->streams[i].sh.bottom = *((int *) opt_data);
00086                     ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->SizeImage = movie->header->SuggestedBufferSize;
00087                     fseek (movie->fp, movie->offset_table[1+i*2+1], SEEK_SET);
00088                     awrite (movie, movie->streams[i].sf, 1, movie->streams[i].sf_size, movie->fp, AVI_BITMAPH);
00089                 }
00090             }
00091 
00092             break;
00093 
00094         case AVI_OPTION_QUALITY:
00095             for (i=0; i < movie->header->Streams; i++) {
00096                 if (avi_get_format_type(movie->streams[i].format) == FCC("vids")) {
00097                     movie->streams[i].sh.Quality = (*((int *) opt_data))*100;
00098                     fseek (movie->fp, movie->offset_table[1+i*2+1], SEEK_SET);
00099                     awrite (movie, movie->streams[i].sf, 1, movie->streams[i].sf_size, movie->fp, AVI_BITMAPH);
00100                 }
00101             }
00102             break;
00103 
00104         case AVI_OPTION_FRAMERATE:
00105             useconds = (int)(1000000/(*((double *) opt_data)));
00106             if (useconds)
00107                 movie->header->MicroSecPerFrame = useconds;
00108 
00109             for (i=0; i < movie->header->Streams; i++) {
00110                 if (avi_get_format_type(movie->streams[i].format) == FCC("vids")) {
00111                     movie->streams[i].sh.Scale = movie->header->MicroSecPerFrame;
00112                     fseek (movie->fp, movie->offset_table[1+i*2+1], SEEK_SET);
00113                     awrite (movie, movie->streams[i].sf, 1, movie->streams[i].sf_size, movie->fp, AVI_BITMAPH);
00114                 }
00115             }
00116 
00117         }
00118 
00119         fseek (movie->fp, movie->offset_table[0], SEEK_SET);
00120         awrite (movie, movie->header, 1, sizeof(AviMainHeader), movie->fp, AVI_MAINH);
00121 
00122         break;
00123     case AVI_OPTION_TYPE_STRH:
00124         break;
00125     case AVI_OPTION_TYPE_STRF:
00126         break;
00127     default:
00128         return AVI_ERROR_OPTION;
00129         break;
00130     }
00131 
00132     return AVI_ERROR_NONE;
00133 }
